title: Application Management
desc: Manage desktop apps, startup policies, and deep uninstall cleanup in one place.
filters.keywordPlaceholder: Search by app name, path, or publisher
experimental.title: Allow editing third-party startup entries (Experimental)
experimental.desc: Off by default. Enabling this allows toggling startup for third-party apps and may require system permissions.
experimental.thirdPartyHint: Third-party startup edits are protected by default. Enable the experimental switch above to continue.
readonly.experimentalDisabled: Experimental feature disabled: third-party startup edits are protected by default.
readonly.systemPolicyManaged: Managed by system policy: this entry is controlled by system or organization policy and is read-only.
readonly.permissionRequired: Insufficient permission: administrator access is required to modify this startup entry.
readonly.permission_denied: Insufficient permission: this item requires elevated system access.
readonly.managed_by_policy: Managed by system policy: this item cannot be modified in-app.
readonly.feature_disabled: Feature disabled: this item is not editable in the current environment.
readonly.unknown: This item is read-only. Check permission and policy settings.
list.title: Applications
detail.empty: Select an app from the left list to view details and actions.
detail.relatedAutoScanHint: Related directories/files are auto-scanned for this app. Click an item to reveal it in your file manager.
cleanup.title: Deep Uninstall & Trace Cleanup
cleanup.copyPathFailed: Copy failed, please copy path manually
cleanup.includeMainAppDesc: When enabled, the main app uninstall runs first, then selected residue cleanup.
cleanup.scanHint: Run a residue scan to inspect matched items and choose cleanup targets.
result.title: Cleanup Result
uninstallDialog.title: Confirm Deep Uninstall
uninstallDialog.desc: This triggers the native uninstall flow. Verify target app details first.
uninstallDialog.deepDesc: This flow runs scan-first cleanup: main uninstall + recommended residue cleanup (partial failure can be skipped).
